snippet: As the N.H.L. labor dispute remained deadlocked, the Board of Governors voted unanimously to support a lockout if no agreement had been reached by midnight Saturday.
abstract: NHL labor dispute remains deadlocked, with Commissioner Gary Bettman promising to call a lockout when the current agreement expires.
lead_paragraph: As the N.H.L. labor dispute remained deadlocked, the Board of Governors voted unanimously to support a lockout if no agreement had been reached by midnight Saturday.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Board Supports Bettman’s Promise to Lock Out Players
headline.main: N.H.L. Talks Still Frozen as Words Heat Up
headline.print_headline: N.H.L. Talks Still Frozen as Words Heat Up
